General.Name: Fondul Proprietatea S.A. GDR
General.Description: Fondul Proprietatea SA is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm invests in the public equity markets of Romania. The firm primarily invests in Power, Oil and Gas sectors. Fondul Proprietatea SA was founded in 2005 and is based in Bucharest, Romania.
General.Address: 10 Wright Street, Westport, CT, United States, 06880
